_sText:
This includes both a small spike area (64 in sq) and a large spike area (116 in sq).

When you step into the trigger over the spikes they come up from the floor and damage you, they then go back down in 1 second.
You can change the damage by going into the "trigger_hurt" trigger and if you use multiple traps you will need to rename the spikes and the "trigger_multiple".
